alert.note: Alert for Polk; Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 11:15AM CST until March 08 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Arkansas, north central Arkansas and western Arkansas, including the following counties, in central Arkansas, Conway, Faulkner, Garland, Perry, Pope, Pulaski, Saline and Yell. In north central Arkansas, Van Buren. In western Arkansas, Johnson, Logan, Montgomery, Polk and Scott. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1115 AM CST, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 5 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Little Rock, Conway, Russellville, Hot Springs Village, Clarksville, Morrilton, Mena, Booneville, Waldron, Paris, Clinton, Danville, Perryville, Mount Ida, Dardanelle, Greenbrier, Atkins, Pottsville, Mayflower and Lamar.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
